overview: Do you like boys who are just that little bit eccentric? Anorak sort-of-guys who perhaps boast above-average intelligence and who don’t quite fit in with the crowd? Lads who wear glasses and can quote episodes of “Star Trek” or “Family Guy” verbatim. Well then, welcome to your own idea of heaven as Oscar Hart, Connor Levi and Kurt Maddox lead a fabulous cast of sexy odd-balls – all of whom are as horned as fuck and gasping for hard cock and hot spunk. Being a geek has never looked so perfect – or so fuckin’ hot!
title: Chic Geek
